English:
Hey! Do you know these people? We promised we
wouldn't bring any outsiders, or have you
forgotten?!
Chinese:
喂！　那群人是小賢你認識的人嗎？
不是說好了不能帶外人來這的嗎？
Korean:
잠깐! 그 사람 켄짱이 데려온 거야?
부외자는 데려오지 않기로 했잖아?
German:
He! Kennst du diese Leute? Wir hatten versprochen,
keine Fremden herzubringen. Schon vergessen?!

English: I'm sorry, but I have a good reason.
Chinese: 對、對不起……這是有原因的。
German: Tut mir leid, aber ich habe einen guten Grund.

English:
It was your idea. You said outsiders would ruin
our memories.
Chinese:
真是的，說會毀掉大家的回憶，
所以不能帶外人來的人，不就是小賢你嗎？
Korean:
정말, 모두와의 추억이 망가지니까
부외자를 들이지 말자고 한 건 켄짱이잖아
German:
Das war deine Idee. Du meintest, Fremde würden
den Nostalgieeffekt ruinieren.

English:
You just left without saying anything last time.
That was pretty rude.
Chinese:
上次還玩到一半，就突然回去了……
你會不會太自私了啊？
Korean:
얼마 전엔 놀던 도중에 갑자기 돌아가버리고……
너무 제멋대로 아니야?
German:
Du bist letztes Mal einfach gegangen, ohne etwas
zu sagen. Ziemlich unhöflich.

English: What did the rest of you do after the game?
Chinese:
那是在玩籠中鳥的時候吧？
大家在那之後怎麼啦？
Korean:
있잖아, 그거 카고메카고메를 하고 있었을 때 얘기지?
그 후에 모두들 어떻게 했어?
German: Was habt ihr denn nach dem Spiel gemacht?

Chinese: 咦？　你是問小賢回去之後嗎？
German: Du meinst, nachdem Kenchan gegangen ist?

English:
Since Kenchan was gone, we decided to call it a
day.
Chinese:
畢竟發起人的小賢都回去了，
那天就只好解散啦。
Korean:
켄짱이 중간에 없어져 버렸으니
그날은 일단 해산하기로 했었지
German: Da er weg war, sind wir auch heimgegangen.

English: It's rude to stare. Say something.
Chinese: 我是說你怎麼盯著別人一直看，真失禮啊。
Korean:
남의 얼굴을 빤히 보다니 실례잖아.
대체 무슨 일인데
German:
Das ist unhöflich, jemanden so anzuglotzen. Jetzt
sag schon was.

Chinese: 艾莉卡？　艾莉卡剛才看出什麼了嗎？
Korean: 에리카? 방금 그건 에리카가 뭔가 한 거야?

English: Kind of. Hmm... It's just as I thought.
Chinese:
算是吧。
嗯……這果然是……
German: Gewissermaßen. Hmm ... Wie ich mir dachte.
